name: The Hair Essentials - Trial + Travel Set
about: What it is:A trio of scalp-loving essentials packed with clinically effective ingredients for visibly thicker, fuller, healthier hair..Hair Texture:Straight, Wavy, Curly, and Coily.Hair Type:Fine, Medium, and Thick.Hair Concerns:- Dryness.Key Benefits:- Hydrates and soothes dryness and irritation.Highlighted Ingredients:- Biomimetic Peptide Blend 5%: Supports hair growth and minimizes fallout..Ingredient Callouts:These products are vegan, gluten-free, cruelty-free, and come in recyclable packaging..What Else You Need to Know:Experience skincare for your scalp with this essential hair-care set. The shampoo and conditioner are formulated with hyaluronic acid, niacinamide, panthenol, and celery seed extract to reverse dryness, minimize irritation, and remove buildup, while the lightweight serum supports hair growth and addresses the look of thinning with a clinically demonstrated, five percent biomimetic peptide blend..Fragrance Description:These products are fragrance-free...Clinical Results:In a 2022 clinical perception study with 50+ participants, who used The Shampoo, The Conditioner, and The Scalp Serum for 60 days:.This Set Contains:- 3.38 oz/ 100 mL The Shampoo- Balancing Cleanse With Hyaluronic Acid, Niacinamide + Panthenol (fragrance-free)
ingredients: -Biomimetic Peptide Blend 5%: Supports hair growth and minimizes fallout..-Hyaluronic Acid (Seven Molecular Weights): Delivers multilevel hydration to scalp and hair..-Niacinamide and Panthenol: Moisturize and support a strong scalp barrier...The Shampoo- Balancing Cleanse With Hyaluronic Acid, Niacinamide + Panthenol:.Aqua/Water/Eau, Sodium Lauroyl Methyl Isethionate, Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice, Cocamidopropyl Betaine, Sodium Methyl Oleoyl Taurate, Sodium Cocoyl Isethionate, Propanediol, Niacinamide, Sodium Hyaluronate, Panthenol, Apium Graveolens (Celery) Seed Extract, Persea Gratissima (Avocado) Oil, Glycerin, Disodium Cocoyl Glutamate, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Citric Acid, Caprylhydroxamic Acid, Sodium Chloride, 1,2-Hexanediol, Caprylyl Glycol, Sodium Benzoate. ..The Conditioner- Hydrating Cream with Hyaluronic Acid, Niacinamide + Panthenol:.Aqua/Water/Eau, Cetearyl Alcohol, Glycerin, Cocos Nucifera (Coconut) Oil, Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice Powder, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Behentrimonium Methosulfate, Persea Gratissima (Avocado) Oil, Niacinamide, Panthenol, Sodium Hyaluronate, Apium Graveolens (Celery) Seed Extract, Cetyl Hydroxyethylcellulose, Citric Acid, Caprylhydroxamic Acid, 1,2-Hexanediol, Caprylyl Glycol, Disodium Phosphate, Hydrated Silica, Propanediol, Silica Dimethyl Silylate, Sodium Phosphate...The Scalp Serum - With 5% Biomimetic Peptide Blend For Hair Growth:.Aqua/Water/Eau, Butylene Glycol, Propanediol, Sodium Hyaluronate, Acetyl Tetrapeptide-3, Niacinamide, Panthenol, Trifolium Pratense (Clover) Flower Extract, Apium Graveolens (Celery) Seed Extract, Camellia Sinensis Leaf Extract, Biotinoyl Tripeptide-1, Nicotiana Benthamiana Hexapeptide-40 sh-Polypeptide-86, Nicotiana Benthamiana Hexapeptide-40 sh-Polypeptide-9,Nicotiana Benthamiana Octapeptide-30 sh-Oligopeptide-2, Sodium Tocopheryl Phosphate, Dextran, 1,2-Hexanediol, Caprylhydroxamic Acid, Citric Acid, Glycerin......The list of ingredients is subject to change, please consult the packaging of the product purchased.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.The Shampoo and The Conditioner:.-Use on wash days...The Scalp Serum:.-Provides a 60-day supply..-Use daily on damp or dry hair. .-Squeeze bulb once to fill pipette to 30 percent, then apply to areas of concern or all over. .-Massage in with fingertips. .-Do not rinse. .-Style as usual. .-Consistent daily use is required for best results... Recycling Instructions:.-Necessaire partners with How2Recycle to provide third-party-verified recycling claims..-Recycle shampoo and conditioner bottles with #2 plastics; the caps are not recyclable. .-Recycle serum bottle with glass; the dropper/pipette is not recyclable..-Cartons/inserts are made with FSC-certified PCR kraft board and can be recycled curbside in the US and Canada.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I think that it is really important for brands to have trial / travel sets so that customers can make sure that they like a product before investing in the full size of it. I have worked really hard to eliminate a lot of ingredients from my skin care / makeup, but I had not made it to my shampoo and conditioner yet. I wanted to try this because I wanted to make sure that my hair would still smell clean if I eliminated fragrance from my hair care routine as well - and lo and behold, it worked! I love the fragrance free versions of their shampoo and conditioner and I love the scalp serum. I feel like I really could tell a difference in my hair after a few weeks of using this. I have a couple other brands I am going to try before I commit to one shampoo / conditioner but this is definitely high on the list. The lather of the shampoo is great and it rinses well. The conditioner, I haven't had to use a lot of, because I have fine / thin hair, but it didn't weigh me down.
This shampoo is so good if you have fine, thin hair.  The serum is the best. Non-greasy. Not sure about the conditioner - but the rest is heaven and this set is really worth it,

reviews.review_title: Good value but did not work for me
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Did not enjoy the shampoo and conditioner. I thought both of them quite drying and caused flaking of my scalp from the first wash. I do however love the packaging and will likely use it with a different shampoo inside. I have not used the scalp serum enough or consistently to comment on it except for the fact that it does not cause my scalp to be oily when I do use it. It has a watery consistency that dried down without being oily or sticky.

reviews.review_title: eh shampoo is good condition is not
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Shampoo is ok, my hair was having some buildup issues and my scalp was a bit irritated and dry so thought this might be good to try. It made my hair soft and clean yes but also dry at the ends. The conditioner smells terrible and added zero moisture to my hair. The scalp serum is ok only tried it a few times so I can't say much about it. But I am about to return it as it isn't worth keeping to sometimes maybe use the shampoo. Glad I got the travel set before bothering to invest in full size. I was hopeful but was weirdly let down.
